text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco 250+ dead today. @GovRonDeSantis By November 3rd, election day 2020, at the current positive test count (not rate) Florida will have more #COVID19 deaths than NY.
If I keep the infection rate at 80% of this week's rate, #florida would have more deaths around labor day.

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day
